Package uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.helpers

SAD Service helper classes for plugin executions, database access and RSS feeds.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoordinatorHelper
    Ensures only one Coordinator instance is in use by the SAD Service.
    DataHelper  
    EccReportsHelper
    Helper class to assist with reporting ECC measurements (WIP).
    PluginRunner
    Custom Quartz plugin runner.
    PluginsHelper
    Helper class for SAD plugins' Executions, DO NOT use anywhere but in plugins as it kills threads on failure (on purpose).
    ProvVideo  
    RssHelper
    Coordinates RSS feeds.
    RssViewer
    Builds SAD RSS feeds.
    WorkflowRunner
    Custom Quartz workflow runner.

Package uk.ac.soton.itinnovation.sad.service.helpers Description

SAD Service helper classes for plugin executions, database access and RSS feeds.
